statements: UPDATE SLA_monitoring SET current_status = 'In Progress' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE SLA_monitoring SET current_status = 'Completed' WHERE request_id = 100;
UPDATE SLA_monitoring SET escalation_priority = 2 WHERE customer_id = 3;
UPDATE SLA_monitoring SET current_status = 'In Progress' WHERE customer_id = 123 AND request_id = 456;
UPDATE SLA_monitoring SET escalation_priority = 2, current_status = 'Pending' WHERE customer_id = 789 AND request_type = 'Technical Support';
UPDATE SLA_monitoring SET escalation_priority = escalation_priority + 1, current_status = 'Overdue' WHERE sla_deadline < NOW();
UPDATE SLA_monitoring SET agreement_name = 'New Agreement' WHERE sla_id = 1;
UPDATE Escalation_prioritization SET priority_level = 2 WHERE escalation_id = 3;
UPDATE SLA_monitoring SET end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE sla_id = 2;
UPDATE SLA_monitoring SET agreement_name = 'Updated Agreement', end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE sla_id = 1;
UPDATE Escalation_prioritization SET priority_level = 2, support_team = 'Customer Support' WHERE escalation_id = 3;
UPDATE SLA_monitoring SET start_date = '2023-01-01', end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE SLAs SET description='Updated Description' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE UrgentSupportRequests SET request_description='Urgent Request Updated' WHERE request_id=100;
UPDATE SupportEscalations SET escalation_status='Resolved' WHERE escalation_id=50;
UPDATE SLAs SET escalation_level = escalation_level + 1 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE UrgentSupportRequests SET urgency_level = CASE WHEN customer_id = 100 THEN urgency_level + 2 ELSE urgency_level END WHERE request_id = 1;
UPDATE SupportEscalations SET escalation_status = 'Resolved', escalation_reason = 'Issue Fixed' WHERE escalation_id = 1;
UPDATE SLAs SET priority = 2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Escalations SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE SupportRequests SET status = 'Closed' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE SLAs SET priority = 1 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Escalations SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE SupportRequests SET status = 'Resolved' WHERE requester_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE SLAs SET target_response_time = 30 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Escalations SET escalation_contact = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE SupportRequests SET status = 'Resolved' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE SLAs SET description = 'Modified description', target_response_time = 30 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Users SET role = 'Admin' WHERE username = 'admin';
UPDATE SupportRequests SET status = 'Completed' WHERE id = 101;
